articles.author: Timothy Ash
articles.title: Abandoning Hope on Russia Sanctions? Don't - Center for European Policy Analysis
articles.description: Russia’s economy has shown resilience. There’s no way to know when sanctions will crack Russia’s economy, but there are promising signs.
articles.content: Theres no way to know when Western sanctions will crack Russias economy, but there are promising signs. A commonly heard complaint for much of the period since Russias all-out invasion of Ukraine in … [+7312 chars]
